title: DDlg Volume 1: The best of Daddy Dom and little girl roleplay
description: The very best of Daddy Dom and little girl role play is finally here. Told through nine tantalizing stories. No matter what you want from your daddy, you can find it in this collect. The dominant. The master. The tender and sweet daddy who just wants to tuck you into bed and lay behind you. So go on, indulge in your fantasy. You know you've been a good girl and earned it...
author: The Grey Knight
